name: Color can
description:
Bring back primary colors to their can of paint !
But be careful, don't get touched by other colors stain.

You can play from 1 to 3 players since you can control the three primary colors individually.

Participation to Trijam 94. (My first jam :D)

CONTROLS

Yellow :

  • Arrow up : jump
  • Arrow right : right
  • Arrow left : left
  • Hold arrow down : absorb/remove color

Red :

  • I : jump
  • L : right
  • J : left
  • Hold K : absorb/remove color

Blue :

  • Z: jump
  • D : right
  • Q : left
  • Hold S : absorb/remove color
